altername_name: Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo
name: Animal Crossing: New Leaf
overview: Animal Crossing: New Leaf is a social simulation game. You take on the role as the new mayor in a small village populated by animals. Game play consists of improving the village with new buildings and decorations, collecting furniture and items for your own house as well as donating fossils, fish, insects and art to the local museum. There's more to discover than ever before in the Animal Crossing: New Leaf—Welcome amiibo game! This updated version of Animal Crossing: New Leaf adds in support for all Animal Crossing series amiibo figures and cards.
